title: Bugsplat.dll
body: I have uninstalled and reinstalled League countless times, but I keep getting the same message after opening the client launcher saying "Bugsplat.dll is missing, please reinstall the program." But no matter how many times I reinstall this program I still get the same thing, and no amount of videos and so far no forum posts have had any answers, please help, i've been trying to play League of months now

replies.body: Your game files not actually be missing, but a security setting could be blocking it from being read.  As a first step, try out the instructions in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
